entry.data:
MOSTLY CLOUDY
LOWS IN THE MID 50S
NORTH WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH

MOSTLY CLOUDY
HIGHS IN THE MID 60S
NORTHEAST WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH

MOSTLY CLOUDY
LOWS IN THE LOWER 50S
NORTHEAST WINDS AROUND 5 MPH

MOSTLY CLOUDY WITH A 40 PERCENT CHANCE OF SHOWERS
HIGHS IN THE MID 60S
EAST WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH

MOSTLY CLOUDY IN THE EVENING, THEN BECOMING PARTLY CLOUDY
LOWS IN THE MID 50S
SOUTHEAST WINDS AROUND 5 MPH

MOSTLY SUNNY
NOT AS COOL WITH HIGHS IN THE LOWER 80S

MOSTLY CLOUDY
LOWS IN THE UPPER 60S

SHOWERS LIKELY WITH A CHANCE OF THUNDERSTORMS
HIGHS IN THE MID 80S
LOWS IN THE LOWER 60S
CHANCE OF RAIN 70 PERCENT

A CHANCE OF SHOWERS IN THE MORNING, THEN SHOWERS LIKELY IN THE AFTERNOON
HIGHS IN THE MID 70S
CHANCE OF RAIN 70 PERCENT

SHOWERS LIKELY WITH A CHANCE OF THUNDERSTORMS
LOWS IN THE LOWER 60S
HIGHS IN THE UPPER 70S
CHANCE OF RAIN 70 PERCENT

MOSTLY CLOUDY IN THE EVENING, THEN BECOMING PARTLY CLOUDY
A CHANCE OF SHOWERS IN THE EVENING
LOWS IN THE MID 50S
CHANCE OF RAIN 40 PERCENT

MOSTLY SUNNY
A CHANCE OF SHOWERS IN THE AFTERNOON
HIGHS IN THE MID 70S
CHANCE OF RAIN 30 PERCENT
